Set Up a New USB File System / Mount an Existing USB File System

## Set Up a New a New USB File System ##

  1. The following lpp's need to be installed on the server 
     lslpp -L devices.usbif.08025002.rte 
     lslpp -L devices.common.IBM.usb.rte
  2. Plug the USB drive / device and run cfomgr to bring the device into the server 
     cfgmgr -v
  3. Make a mount point 
     mkdir /usb_mnt
  4. Make in line log file system on USB 
     mkfs -olog=INLINE,ea=v2 -Vjfs2 /dev/usbms0
  5. Mount the USB File System 
     mount -V jfs2 -o log=/dev/usbms0 /dev/usbms0 /usb_mnt

## Mount an Existing USB FIle System ##

  1. Make a mount point 
     mkdir /usb_mnt
  2. Mount the USP File System 
     mount -V jfs2 -o log=/dev/usbms0 /dev/usbms0 /usb_mnt
